sentence: There Novick threw a political jab, challenging Merkley's statements that he had been an opponent of the war from the start by pointing to his support of a Republican-drafted non-binding resolution in 2003, two days after the invasion began, that praised President George W. Bush for the invasion of Iraq and the efforts of the troops and prayed for their safety.

examples.sentence: ...which merged with the progressive conservative party of canada in 2003 to form...
...merged with the progressive conservative party of canada in 2003 to form...
